log.zh-cn: 正式公布开发版目录,入口只在'站点日志'页面里展示
log.en-us: Now introducing download pages for China Beta.

log.zh-cn: 关于开发版目录:1.页面资料均来自网络;2.从这里刷机刷出了问题,别去找官方的麻烦,此种情况找官方只会害人害己;3.请不要在有官方人员的地方宣传本页面;
log.en-us: About China Beta pages:1.Links are crawled through Internet. 2.If you found any bug by upgrading from this page, do not pick on MIUI Dev Team for others. 3.DO NOT talk about this page in front of any Xiaomi Officials.

log.zh-cn: 新增招募页面：为了有效收集MIUI11链接，综合考虑过后决定现建群，再研究技术细节，初步计划每个机型一两人

log.zh-cn: 非常感谢大家的帮助！
log.en-us: Thanks you for all your support.

log.zh-cn: 小米MIX2
小米9 SE、Redmi 7A、红米6 Pro
更新了部分机型的稳定版
请注意，红米6 Pro 引入了“防回刷”机制，谨记相关限制，以防损坏手机
log.en-us: Redmi 6 Pro introduced 'Anti-rollback' feature, please make sure while you flash roms.

log.zh-cn: 新添加了开发版页面
出于各种原因，该页面会收录MIUI11 开发版，一周一更，资源来自于网络，并非经过“官方”认证，有需要来拿就好
log.en-us: Due to some reasons, China Beta pages will be updated weekly, and it's 'unofficial' official roms.

log.zh-cn: 以上页面如果没有收录某个机型，那么说明我没找到该机型的链接亦或者官方没有发布该机型的该版本
log.en-us: I crawl through Internet to get MIUI11 China Beta, if some devices are missing updates, that means I never found it.

log.zh-cn: 小米9 Pro 5G、Redmi 7

log.en-us: MIUI11 Logo is Sites logo now

log.zh-cn: 改了点样式
原本想着MIUI论坛里的收集起来还是OK的，但是没想到部分合集帖已经被屏蔽掉了，只能等待后续通过Wayback Machine去找了
log.en-us: Some data in MIUI Forum has been deleted while I Access it, it means I need to get data by going to Wayback Machine, which is much more harder.

log.zh-cn: 不过论坛上能找到的，我都保存了一下，近期更新的都会是这些机型
log.en-us: But I saved some threads before further deletion.
